attributes.action: refrain from replacing the government with a strawberry blancmange
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are numerous moves afoot to replace the government of the United Kingdoms of Great Britain and Northern Ireland with a small strawberry blancmange. This would undermine democracy as blancmanges are known to have dictatorial tendencies.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
